markdownRemark.html:
I had the opportunity to spike a demo in our office and share my understanding on EventSourcing implementation using Akka Persistence. The slides are compiled into the following link:

lightning-eventsourcing-akka.pdf

The code itself can be found on Github faizhasim/lightning-talk-akka-persistence.

And here is a random video that I made last year.
